name: starch
text:
it is stone cold hard to pronounce "hellllll-o"
that abrupt o at the end is rough.

name: diggidy
text:
Most people lengthen the 'O' in hello.
Ray lengthens the 'L'.

This is because "hellllll" is where he's going.
